website_summaries.verdict: The best option to buy when you simply want a toenail correction device without the extra tools of a whole kit.
pros: Small enough to fit in a pocket for convenient on-the-go use while away from home
Comes with instructions to know exactly how to get the best results from the very start
Convenient carrying case protects the device when not in use
cons: Fixing the toenail can lead to intense but temporary pain, especially in the big toe

customer_reviews.title: It works well. and quickly!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have had a misshapen ingrown toenail that has been killing me for months. I couldn't even touch it. I bought this little tool with few expectations, but it made sense to me. Today is only day 2 and let me say, my toenail is so much better already! It is already coming back into shape, and it's still tender, but way better! Worth every penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: warf_rat

customer_reviews.title: Worked on one big toe but not the other
customer_reviews.text: This is a difficult little contraption to operate unless you have 3 hands, HOWEVER it did work on one big toe with my husband's assistance. Tonight, the part that hooks onto the toenail edge caused the side of my other big toenail to crack off. It seemed to be working ok over the past 2 days but I'm just hoping I don't have to have surgery on it. It isn't infected but if it grows inward where it cracked off it may. NUTS! Wanted this to work so badly.
customer_reviews.author: pamelajoan

customer_reviews.title: Best little invention EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this item! This is my second one as the first got used so much it started not to hold. Howver - at this price I really don't mind - lasted about 6 months so I am VERY pleased. I also take it to my pedicure so that my ingrown right nail can be lifted for filing! Works wonders!!!!

product_meta.description:
Size:Ingrown Toenail Tool
Care your health begin with details! 
❥How to use it: 
1. Soak your feet in warm water for 10-15 minutes and wipe dry it with a clean cloth. 
2. Toe nails, hands and tools disinfection treatment. 
3. Use one hand hold the middle fulcrum of the tool, twisting the nut to fix the equipment on the toenail with the other hand (fulcrum towards two directions for different sizes of the nails). 
4. Slowly intensify, till there is a sense of expansion (no pain) (patients can soak your feet in warm water when take the correction ). 
5. Intensify slightly for every 10 minutes 
6. After 30 minutes later, take the feet out of the water, wait for 15 minutes to dry feet. 
7. Remove the equipment, the toenail is reshaped, position, stuff some medical cotton under the tilted nails to prevent rebound. 

❥Please Note: 
1. For patients who has too severe ingrown toenail, professional treatment is recommended, don't correct it by yourself 
2. You'd better do it just before sleeping, normally take the correction every 2-5 days, it would be cure in 1-4months generally 
3. Do not cut your toenail too short to wear the device 
4. Correction of the intensity should be gradually increased, strong intensity will hurt the nail bed. 

❥Specification: 
Material: Alloy 
Color: Gold 
Weight: 50g 
Specification: General size 
Size Approx.: 0.9 * 1.6 inch
